Pre-Game Insights: Cleveland Cavaliers' new head coach Kenny Atkinson emphasized the importance of three-point shooting, with point guard Darius Garland noting that the team aims to get as many three-pointers as possible, including in transition and from the perimeter
Miscellaneous Highlights: Max Strus' absence due to a sprained ankle will impact Cleveland's starting lineup, with Dean Wade and Georges Niang likely stepping in to replace his production
Others: The injury comes at a challenging time for the Cavaliers, who are expected to rely heavily on three-point shooting with Max Strus out
